urlLink The valley filled with a sea of mist in the early morning, as seen from the village water pump on my trek in North Laos, 2003. urlLink
urlLink The beautiful village I stayed at with my travel companions in the Phongsali district, North Laos 2003. urlLink

urlLink From left to right: Me (Steve Shea), Loretta and Richard enjoying breakfast at the chief's house in a remote village in the Phongsali district. We made our way there without a guide, but with a roughly sketched map given to us by a friendly local in Phongsali town. Laos 2003. urlLink
urlLink Mountain terrain. The view from the start of our trek in Phongsali, North Laos 2003. urlLink
